channel.title: Pulp Fiction on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Pulp Fiction on Rusland 1

item.title: До свиданья, дорогая!
item.description: Я СМЕЛЕЙ (2019) I am braver – from their first and only album Себя потерял (2019). A world of colorful paints But I am just a shadow Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver

item.title: 25/17 3x
item.description: 25/17 is/was Ant (Ant) or Anton Zavyalov (1982) and Bledny (Pale) or Andrey Pozdnukhov (1976). Подорожник (Plantain) (2014) From the album Русский подорожник (Russian plantain ). Featuring Dmitry Revyakin (= Dmitry Revyakin ), from Kalinov Most (= Kalinov Most ).

item.title: Photo: Gosha Bergal
item.description: Salarjevo Саларьево (Salarjevo) is (besides being a metro station in Moscow ) a photo project by Bergal. You can view it on Issuu (2020) – definitely worth checking out. More photos on Mdfschool.ru (2019). Reportage Bergal also ventures into current affairs.
